profiles.name: Warm Cynic
profiles.description: You combine deep skepticism with sincere care. You’ll call out the nonsense, but secretly still want connection.

profiles.name: Earnest Explorer
profiles.description: You’re on a journey to understand both yourself and others. Your curiosity and honesty are your greatest assets.

profiles.name: Hopeful Idealist
profiles.description: You believe in people. Maybe too much sometimes. But your optimism gives others a reason to show up.

profiles.name: Gentle Challenger
profiles.description: You support growth with kindness and ask good, hard questions. People underestimate your power.

profiles.name: Hard-Learned Lover
profiles.description: You’ve been through it. But you’ve done the work. You love with eyes wide open and feet on the ground.

profiles.name: Introspective Firecracker
profiles.description: You’re wild and wise. You burn bright, feel deeply, and ask yourself all the right questions — eventually.

profiles.name: Cynical Adventurer
profiles.description: You’re fun, charming, and just detached enough to feel safe. But when someone gets in, you ride hard for them.

profiles.name: Resilient Seeker
profiles.description: You’ve taken your hits and kept your heart. You’re trying again — with more wisdom this time.

profiles.name: The Sage
profiles.description: You see the big picture. Calm, perceptive, and strategic. You choose your people and your energy carefully.

profiles.name: Emotional Architect
profiles.description: You’ve thought about every angle. You build strong emotional frameworks, even if spontaneity scares you.

profiles.name: Wounded Healer
profiles.description: You’ve turned your wounds into understanding. You show up for others with empathy, but sometimes forget yourself.

profiles.name: Dreamy Romantic
profiles.description: Love is a language you’re fluent in. You believe in magic and long looks — and sometimes forget the fine print.

profiles.name: Unicorn
profiles.description: You’re balanced, complex, and beautifully contradictory. The usual rules just don’t apply — and that’s the magic.

profiles.name: Evergreen Wanderer
profiles.description: You’re steady and curious, building your insight step by step. You’re not in a rush — and that’s your strength.

profiles.name: Rubber Ducky
profiles.description: You’re more self-aware than you let on. There’s depth under your easygoing surface.

profiles.name: Delicate Teacup
profiles.description: You’re doing your best. You want to connect, but protecting yourself feels safer. That’s real.

profiles.name: Rollercoaster Rider
profiles.description: Your emotions run the show. You love hard, crash hard, and are still learning how to coast.

profiles.name: Stop Sign
profiles.description: Something needs attention. You’re protecting yourself with shutdown — but healing is possible.

profiles.name: Emotional Arsonist
profiles.tagline: If it burns, you lit it.
profiles.description: You test people to see if they’ll stay. Underneath the chaos is someone who really wants to be known.

attachmentStyles.name: Secure
attachmentStyles.description: You’re comfortable with closeness and independence. You trust, connect, and set boundaries with grace.

attachmentStyles.name: Anxious-Leaning Secure
attachmentStyles.description: You know you’re lovable — but you still worry sometimes. You value connection and can voice your needs.

attachmentStyles.name: Anxious or Avoidant
attachmentStyles.description: You crave closeness but fear it too. You swing between needing reassurance and pulling away.

attachmentStyles.name: Disorganized
attachmentStyles.description: You feel pulled in two directions: desperate for intimacy, but scared of it too.
